Class PreRegZipHandlingServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mosip.registration.service.external.impl.PreRegZipHandlingServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreRegZipHandlingService

    @Service
public class PreRegZipHandlingServiceImpl
extends Object
implements PreRegZipHandlingService
    This class is used to handle the pre-registration packet zip files
